metadata.title: CVE-2021-31321 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Telegram Android <7.1.0 (2090), Telegram iOS <7.1, and Telegram macOS <7.1are affected by a Stack Based Overflow in the gray_split_cubic function oftheir custom fork of the rlottie library. A remote attacker might be ableto overwrite Telegram's stack memory out-of-bounds on a victim device via amalicious animated sticker.

criterions.comment: rlottie package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
